tool_description: Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
name: YouTube Data
title: YouTube Data

api_list.name: auto-complete
video-streaming-data
video-related-contents
community-post-comments

required_parameters.name: cursor
required_parameters.description:
Cursor token

You can get it from the Community Post Details endpoint.

api_list.name: community-post-details
search
channel-community
video-comments
playlist-videos
playlist-details
video-details
channel-channels

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter key or token, default: all_collections

Keys you can enter:

all_collections: Returns channel collections
subscriptions: Returns subscribed channels
or custom collection token

api_list.name: channel-playlists

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter key or token, default: all_collections

Keys you can enter:

all_collections: Returns playlist collections
created_playlists_newest: Returns created playlists (by newest)
created_playlists_last_video_added: Returns created playlists (by last video added)
saved_playlists: Returns saved playlists
or custom collection token

api_list.name: channel-videos

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter key, default: videos_latest

Keys you can enter:

videos_latest: Returns videos (by latest)
streams_latest: Returns live streams (by latest)
shorts_latest: Returns short videos (by latest)
live_now: Returns current live streams

api_list.name: channel-details
